summary: When a department manager at Swedish Television threatens to relocate one of the less talented documentary filmmakers, the filmmaker puts forward the idea to film his dying father.
cast: Johan Rheborg|Jonas Inde|Robert Gustafsson|Henrik Schyffert|Per Ragnar|Stina Ekblad|Erland Josephson|Inger Holmstrand|Anna Norberg|Michael Nyqvist
title: På sista versen
